entities.name: Personal Banking Customer
entities.desc: A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.

entities.name: Internet Banking System
entities.desc: Allows customers to view information about their bank accounts and make payments.

entities.name: Mainframe Banking System
entities.desc: Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions etc

entities.name: Email System
entities.desc: The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.

entities.name: Web Application
entities.desc: Delivers the static content and the Internet Banking single page application.

entities.name: Mobile Application
entities.desc: Provides a limited subset of the internet banking functionality to customers via their mobile device.

entities.name: Database
entities.desc: Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs etc.

entities.name: Single-Page Application
entities.desc: Provides all of the Internet Banking functionality to the customers via their web browser

entities.name: Api Application
entities.desc: Provides internet banking functionality via a JSON/HTTPS api.
